long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Attempting to add or modify a calendar event produces an error pop-up with the following text:
XML Parsing Error: undefined entity Location: chrome://calendar/content/calendar-event-dialog.xul Line Number 1216, Column 23: <checkbox id="notify-attendees-checkbox" ----------------------^
The calendar appears to have hung on opening - cursor shows continuous activity when over the calendar.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): thunderbird-45.6.0-2.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: Upgrade Thunderbird to the above version.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Upgrade to thunderbird-45.6.0-2.fc25.x86_64 2. 3.
Actual results: Calendar events cannot be created or edited.
Expected results: Calendar events respond without error.
Additional info: See bug 1330427 where an error with similar symptoms occurred.
Thanks for the report, seems that langpacks for calendar was wrongly generated. I'm currently doing new builds. Please stay tuned for updated packages.
